capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: The role requires the ability to express views, accept, and commit to change in a regulatory environment, often under challenging circumstances.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Maintaining ethical standards and adherence to public sector values is crucial in a regulatory role that impacts public safety and compliance.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Self-motivation and a proactive approach are essential for leading in a dynamic and technical field.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respecting diverse backgrounds is important in a role that interacts with a wide range of stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Clear communication and stakeholder engagement are key to promoting regulatory compliance and safety.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with industry stakeholders and internal teams is essential for developing and enforcing regulatory frameworks.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: The role requires influencing industry practices and negotiating compliance and safety improvements.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Achieving safety, compliance, and regulatory outcomes is a primary goal of this role.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Analytical skills to develop practical solutions for safety and technical challenges in the gas and pipeline sector.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: The role is responsible for critical infrastructure safety, requiring a high level of accountability and adherence to policy.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Effective planning and coordination are needed for developing response plans and technical research programs.

skills.name: Technical Expertise in Gas Networks and Pipelines
skills.description: In-depth knowledge of gas network and pipeline construction, operation, maintenance, and safety.

skills.name: Regulatory Framework Development
skills.description: Ability to develop and enforce regulatory frameworks for public safety and compliance.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with a range of stakeholders to promote regulatory compliance and safety.

generalRole.title: Regulatory Compliance and Safety Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves leading safety, technical regulation, and licensing functions within the energy sector, focusing on gas networks and pipelines. It requires a blend of technical expertise, regulatory knowledge, and stakeholder engagement to ensure public safety and compliance.
